Name: AWS - Create Cloud Formation Stack
Description:
Creates a [Amazon Cloud Formation Stack](#http://docs.aws.amazon.com/powershell/latest/reference/items/New-CFNStack.html) with the template specified.

- Requires the [AWS PowerShell cmdlets](http://aws.amazon.com/powershell/)

**NOTE - THIS TEMPLATE DELETES THE STACK IF IT EXISTS**

Parameters.Name: AWSSecretAccessKey
Parameters.Label: AWS Secret Access Key
Parameters.HelpText: The [secret access key](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSSimpleQueueService/latest/SQSGettingStartedGuide/AWSCredentials.html) to use when executing the script

Parameters.Name: AWSAccessKey
Parameters.Label: AWS Access Key
Parameters.HelpText: The [access key](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSSimpleQueueService/latest/SQSGettingStartedGuide/AWSCredentials.html) to use when executing the script

Parameters.Name: AWSRegion
Parameters.Label: AWS Region
Parameters.HelpText: The Amazon Region see (http://docs.aws.amazon.com/powershell/latest/reference/items/Get-AWSRegion.html) for further info

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
us-east-1|US East (Virginia)
us-west-1|US West (N. California)
us-west-2|US West (Oregon)
eu-west-1|EU West (Ireland)
eu-central-1|EU Central (Frankfurt)
ap-northeast-1|Asia Pacific (Tokyo)
ap-southeast-1|Asia Pacific (Singapore)
ap-southeast-2|Asia Pacific (Sydney)
sa-east-1|South America (Sao Paulo)

Parameters.Name: CloudFormationStackName
Parameters.Label: AWS Cloud Formation Stack Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the AWS Cloud Formation Stack

Parameters.Name: CloudFormationCapability
Parameters.Label: AWS Cloud Formation Capability
Parameters.HelpText: The capability required for the tempate see [docs](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/powershell/latest/reference/items/New-CFNStack.html)

Parameters.Name: UseS3ForCloudFormationTemplate
Parameters.Label: Use AWS S3 storage for the Cloud Formation Template
Parameters.HelpText: Whether to use S3 storage to source the Cloud Formation script.  See [docs](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/powershell/latest/reference/items/New-CFNStack.html)

Parameters.Name: CloudFormationTemplate
Parameters.Label: The Cloud Formation Template
Parameters.HelpText: The Cloud Formation Template in the format, see [docs](http://aws.amazon.com/cloudformation/aws-cloudformation-templates/)

Parameters.Name: CloudFormationTemplateURL
Parameters.Label: The location in S3 for the Cloud Formation Template

Parameters.Name: CloudFormationParameters
Parameters.Label: Cloud Formation Parameters e.g. Key1:Value1,Key2:Value2
Parameters.HelpText:
See [docs](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/powershell/latest/reference/items/New-CFNStack.html)

The format is Key:Value with multiple items separated by a (,).

e.g. `Key1:Value1,Key2:Value2`

Parameters.Name: UseS3ForStackPolicy
Parameters.Label: Use AWS S3 Storage for Cloud Formation Stack Policy

Parameters.Name: CloudFormationStackPolicyURL
Parameters.Label: The URL for the Cloud Formation Policy in S3
